trans-unit.source: Exposes a <xref:System.IO.Stream> around a named pipe, which supports both synchronous and asynchronous read and write operations.
trans-unit.target: Viser en <xref:System.IO.Stream>rundt en navngitt datakanal som støtter både synkrone og asynkrone lese og skrive operasjoner.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Named pipes provide one-way or duplex pipes for communication between a pipe server and one or more pipe clients.
trans-unit.target: Navngitte datakanaler angi enveis eller dobbeltsidig datakanaler for kommunikasjon mellom en datakanalserveren og én eller flere datakanalklienter.

trans-unit.source: Named pipes can be used for interprocess communication locally or over a network.
trans-unit.target: Kan brukes navngitte datakanaler for interprosesskommunikasjon lokalt eller via et nettverk.

trans-unit.source: A single pipe name can be shared by multiple NamedPipeClientStream objects.
trans-unit.target: En enkelt datakanalnavnet kan deles av flere NamedPipeClientStream-objekter.

trans-unit.source: Any process can act as either a named pipe server or client, or both.
trans-unit.target: En prosess kan fungere som en navngitt datakanal-server eller klient eller begge deler.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For [!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/add/includes/winxppro-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/add/includes/win2kserver-md.md)], a maximum of 10 pipes can simultaneously connect over the network.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For [!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/add/includes/winxppro-md.md)] og [!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/add/includes/win2kserver-md.md)], maksimalt 10 datakanaler kan koble seg over nettverket.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream"></xref> class with the specified pipe name.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream"> </xref> klassen med navnet datakanalen.

trans-unit.target: – En standard <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>verdien for <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>.</xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel> </xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>

trans-unit.target: – En standard <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>verdien for <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>.</xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability> </xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream"></xref> class with the specified pipe and server names, and the specified pipe options, security impersonation level, and inheritability mode.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream"> </xref> klassen med de angitte datakanal server navnene og, og datakanalen alternativene, sikkerhet representasjonsnivået og inheritability modus.

trans-unit.source: The pipe direction for this constructor is determined by the `desiredAccessRights` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Datakanalen retningen for denne konstruktøren fastsettes av den `desiredAccessRights` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: If the `desiredAccessRights` value is <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>, the pipe direction will be <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `desiredAccessRights` verdien er <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>, datakanalen retningen <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>

trans-unit.source: If the value of `desiredAccessRights` is <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>, the pipe direction will be <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for `desiredAccessRights` er <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>datakanalen retningen blir <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>

trans-unit.source: If the value of `desiredAccessRights` includes both <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights> and <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>, the pipe direction will be <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for `desiredAccessRights` inkluderer både <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>og <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>datakanalen retningen blir <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>

trans-unit.source: The name of the remote computer to connect to, or "." to specify the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på den eksterne datamaskinen til å koble til, eller "." til å angi den lokale datamaskinen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på datakanalen.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the desired access rights of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: En av opplistingsverdiene som som angir de ønskede tilgangsrettighetene for datakanalen.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines how to open or create the pipe.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines the security impersonation level.
trans-unit.target: En av opplistingsverdiene som som bestemmer representasjonsnivået sikkerhet.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines whether the underlying handle will be inheritable by child processes.
trans-unit.target: En av verdiene for enumeration som bestemmer om det underliggende håndtaket skal arvbare av underordnede prosesser.

trans-unit.source: Connects to a waiting server with an infinite time-out value.
trans-unit.target: Kobler til en venting server med en uendelig Tidsavbruddverdien.

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%28System.Int32%29> method with an infinite time-out value.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kaller den <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%28System.Int32%29>metode med en uendelig Tidsavbruddverdien.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%28System.Int32%29>

trans-unit.source: This method waits for a pipe instance to become available.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden venter på en datakanalforekomst blir tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A> might return before <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> is called from the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> object, but <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> will not return until <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A> has returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>kan returnere før <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>kalles fra den <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>objektet, men <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>vil ikke gå tilbake til <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>har returnert.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A></xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any data written to the pipe after a <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream> object has connected, but before the server has called <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>, will be available to the server following the call to <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Alle data som skrives til datakanalen etter en <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>objektet er koblet, men før serveren er kalt <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>, vil være tilgjengelig på serveren etter kall til <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>

trans-unit.source: The client is already connected.
trans-unit.target: Klienten er allerede tilkoblet.

trans-unit.source: Connects to a waiting server within the specified time-out period.
trans-unit.target: Kobler til en server som venter i den angitte tidsavbruddsperioden.

trans-unit.source: This method waits for a pipe instance to become available.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden venter på en datakanalforekomst blir tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A> might return before <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> is called from the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>, but <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> will not return until <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A> has returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>returnerer kanskje før <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>kalles fra den <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>, men <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>vil ikke gå tilbake til <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>har returnert.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A></xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: You set the `timeout` parameter to <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite> to specify an infinite time-out value.
trans-unit.target: Du har angitt den `timeout` parameter <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>til å angi en uendelig Tidsavbruddverdien.</xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>

trans-unit.source: Any data written to the pipe after a <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream> object has connected, but before the server has called <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>, will be available to the server following the call to <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Alle data som skrives til datakanalen etter en <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>objektet er koblet, men før serveren er kalt <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>, vil være tilgjengelig på serveren etter kall til <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait for the server to respond before the connection times out.
trans-unit.target: Antall millisekunder man skal vente på at serveren skal svare før tilkoblingen blir tidsavbrutt.

trans-unit.source: Could not connect to the server within the specified timeout period.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke koble til serveren i den angitte timeout periode.

trans-unit.source: timeout is less than 0 and not set to .
trans-unit.target: timeouter mindre enn 0 og ikke er satt til .

trans-unit.source: The client is already connected.
trans-unit.target: Klienten er allerede tilkoblet.

trans-unit.source: The server is connected to another client and the time-out period has expired.
trans-unit.target: Serveren er koblet til en annen klient og tidsavbruddsperioden er utløpt.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously connects to a waiting server with an infinite timeout period.
trans-unit.target: Kobler til en venting server med en uendelig tidsavbruddsperioden asynkront.

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous connect operation.
trans-unit.target: En oppgave som representerer den asynkrone koble operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously connects to a waiting server within the specified timeout period.
trans-unit.target: Asynkront kobler til en server som venter i den angitte tidsavbruddsperioden.

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait for the server to respond before the connection times out.
trans-unit.target: Antall millisekunder man skal vente på at serveren skal svare før tilkoblingen blir tidsavbrutt.

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous connect operation.
trans-unit.target: En oppgave som representerer den asynkrone koble operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously connects to a waiting server and monitors cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: Asynkront kobler til en server som venter, og overvåker avbryte forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: Tokenet, for å overvåke for å avbryte forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None*>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None*>.</xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None*>

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous connect operation.
trans-unit.target: En oppgave som representerer den asynkrone koble operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously connects to a waiting server within the specified timeout period and monitors cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: Asynkront kobler til en server som venter i den angitte tidsavbruddsperioden og overvåker avbryte forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait for the server to respond before the connection times out.
trans-unit.target: Antall millisekunder man skal vente på at serveren skal svare før tilkoblingen blir tidsavbrutt.

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: Tokenet, for å overvåke for å avbryte forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None*>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None*>.</xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None*>

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous connect operation.
trans-unit.target: En oppgave som representerer den asynkrone koble operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream"></xref> instance is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressurser og til å utføre andre operasjoner for opprydding før den <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream"> </xref> forekomsten gode av datasanering.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of server instances that share the same pipe name.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall serverforekomster som deler samme datakanalnavnet.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the number of server instances for the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> object that the current <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream> object has a handle to or is connected to.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer antall serverforekomster for den <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>objekt som gjeldende <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>objektet har en referanse til eller kobles til.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream> object has not yet connected to a named pipe server, or if the current pipe handle has not yet been set, this property throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det gjeldende <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>objektet er ennå ikke er koblet til en navngitt datakanal for server, eller hvis den gjeldende datakanal referansen ennå ikke er angitt, egenskapen oppstår en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>

trans-unit.source: The number of server instances that share the same pipe name.
trans-unit.target: Antall serverforekomster som deler samme datakanalnavnet.

trans-unit.source: The pipe handle has not been set.
trans-unit.target: Datakanalen referansen er ikke angitt.

trans-unit.source: -or- The current <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream"></xref> object has not yet connected to a <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: - eller - gjeldende <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream"> </xref> objektet har ennå ikke koblet til en <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The pipe is broken or an I/O error occurred.
trans-unit.target: Datakanalen er skadet, eller det oppstod en i/u-feil.

trans-unit.source: The underlying pipe handle is closed.
trans-unit.target: Den underliggende datakanal referansen er lukket.
